DIVIDEND
Dividend Outflow (Rs. in Locs)
Your Directors propose to make the interim dividend of Rs. 14.50 per share for
the financial year ended 31st March, 2000 paid during the current year as final
dividend for the year under report, as against Rs. 12 per share paid for the
previous year.
CONSERVATION OF ENERGY
During the year under report, the measures initiated/implemented by the
Company for conservation of energy included the following main items :
Use of Variable Frequency Drive (VFD) on condenser pumps of
Cigarette Making and Packing Department to adjust the speed as
per load conditions.
Replacement of higher H.P. motors with energy efficient motors
having an efficiency of as high as 92% and above.
* Including Corporate Dividend Tox
